description:

equipped with faucets and quantities of hygiene and sterilization
materials such as soap, javel and medical masks in the markets, points
of sale of fish, meat and vegetables, health centers and other service
facilities in addition to the places where cars gather and at the
entrances to the city of Aleg".

description: On March 29,  officials from the Mauritanian state of gorgol announced that all travel in and out of the city of kaedi would be restricted except for specific cases.

In Mauritania a crisis committee was created called "Covid-19 contamination control committee chaired by whose main task is to coordinate and follow up directives aimed at fight against the Coronavirus starting with the implementation of the following decisions: 
1. The creation of a scientific committee, which must set up a training program on hygiene measures and medical care for suspected or confirmed patients.
2. The strengthening of the Hospital Hygiene and Nosocomial Infection Control Committee, through a new specific mission to combat COVID-19 contamination.
3. The creation of hand washing points from Tuesday, March 17, 2020 at the front door of the Center.
4. Reactivation of staff awareness on the importance of hygiene measures and multi-daily cleaning of surfaces.
5. The limitation to the strict minimum of patient visits and the number of accompanying persons per patient.
6. A 50% reduction in the number of consultations and avoiding crowding of patients in waiting rooms by respecting the distance of one meter between patients.
type: New Task Force, Bureau or Administrative Configuration
enforcer: Other (Please specify in the text box)
